mapper.select: select t1.id, t3.account_name accountName, t4.staff_name staffName, t4.staff_num staffNum, t5.department_name staffDepartmentName from t_role_apply t1 left join t_apply_role_account t2 on t1.id=t2.apply_id left join t_account t3 on t2.account_id=t3.id left join t_staff t4 on t3.id=t4.account_id left join t_department t5 on t4.department_id=t5.id where t1.id=#{applyId}
